contents: Article 15 (Organization) ① The committee members shall be no more than 15 experts from various fields, including sports, culture, and media. The chairman and members shall be appointed by the chairman, and the vice-chairman shall be elected from among the members. The chairman shall receive the consent of the board of directors. Revised 2016. 7. 19., 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31. ② The head of the member city/provincial sports association of the city/province where the National Sports Festival, National Youth Sports Festival, and National Sports Festival for Life is held is the head of each competition. In relation to this, one member may be recommended each, and if there is no reason for disqualification, the chairman must appoint the recommended person as a member. Revised on June 16, 2016, January 24, 2022. ③ When forming committee members, the following items must be observed. Revised on April 3, 2017, January 31, 2019, and February 11, 2020. In accordance with Article 45 (3) of the Articles of Incorporation, persons who are disqualified from being officers of the Sports Association cannot become members. Revised 2022. 1. 24. 2. Deleted 2019. 1. 31. 3. Athletes registered with sports association member sports organizations cannot become committee members. 4. Efforts must be made to ensure that the gender ratio of committee members does not exceed 70% of the number of registered members. Revised January 24, 2022. ④ The committee shall have one secretary, who shall be appointed by the president from among the Athletic Association staff.
